Title: Relates to the time period which an application for refund can be made when the refund is based on a clerical error or unlawful entry
Summary: Relates to the time period in which an application for refund can be made when the refund is based on a clerical error or unlawful entry by allowing a full refund without time limitation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the time period for refunds attributable to clerical error or an unlawful entry
